gtregression 1.0.0
  • Reference
    • Getting Started with gtregression

Package index

Regression Functions

Fit univariate and multivariable models

uni_reg()
Univariate regression (Odds, Risk, or Rate Ratios)
multi_reg()
Multivariable Regression (Adjusted Odds, Risk, or Rate Ratios)
uni_reg_nbin()
Univariate Negative Binomial Regression
multi_reg_nbin()
Multivariable Negative Binomial Regression (Adjusted IRRs)

Regression Functions by stratifier

Fit univariate and multivariable models by stratifier

stratified_uni_reg()
Performs univariate regression for each exposure on a binary, count, or continuous outcome, stratified by a specified variable. Produces a stacked `gtsummary` table with one column per stratum, along with underlying models and diagnostics.
stratified_multi_reg()
Stratified Multivariable Regression (Adjusted OR, RR, IRR, or Beta)
stratified_uni_nbin()
Stratified Univariate Negative Binomial Regression
stratified_multi_nbin()
Stratified Multivariable Negative Binomial Regression

Model Selection & Diagnostics

Model selection, collinearity, and convergence tools

select_models()
Stepwise Model Selection with Evaluation Metrics
check_collinearity()
Check Collinearity Using VIF for Fitted Models
check_convergence()
Check Convergence for a Regression Model

Confounding & Interaction

Identify confounders and effect modifiers

identify_confounder()
Identify Confounders Using the Change-in-Estimate Method
interaction_models()
Compare Models With and Without Interaction Term

Tables & Customization

Customize regression output tables

modify_table()
Modify Regression Table Labels and Layout Allows customization of publication ready tables Designed for use with tables generated by regression functions
save_table()
Save a Single Regression Table
save_docx()
Save Multiple Tables and Plots to a Word Document

Plotting

Forest plots of regression models

plot_reg()
Visualize a Regression Model as a Forest Plot
plot_reg_combine()
Visualize Univariate and Multivariate Regression Side-by-Side
save_plot()
Save a Single Plot

Example Datasets

Built-in datasets for demo and testing

data_PimaIndiansDiabetes
PimaIndians2 Diabetes Dataset
data_gt_quin
Student Absenteeism in Rural Schools
data_birthwt
Birth Weight Data
data_epilepsy
Epilepsy Treatment and Seizure Counts
data_infertility
Infertility Matched Case-Control Study
data_lungcancer
Lung Cancer Trial Data
